TCH

The old reading of 𓎡 as something close to tch is preserved in the 𓏏𓍿/𓎡 tc/k duality of second person pronouns ("Dich"):
𓎡𓎡𓇰 Dunkel du²kelle 𓎟 total ⇔ 𓎡 Tu/Tasse
𓎡 tch in 𓂋𓎡𓄯 ration 𓎡 թաս tʰɑs Tasse !
𓎡 tus (your) 𓏊
𓎡 Դուք կարդում եք (dook kartoom ek) you read
𓎡 Դուք հիանաք (dook әheeyan_ak_) you admire
𓎡 𓏏 𓏏 𓅪 𒁖𒆥 𒆥 daq-qi-qi very tiny ( 𓎡 𓏏 k ⇔ t flipped !)
